_header: O Virgin chaste both first and last
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: James Ryman, an orison to the Virgin Mary — three quatrains (aabb) including refrain, ‘Ora pro nobis’ and burden: ‘Sancta maria ora pro nobis’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O virgyn chast Both ffurst and lastThat in tyme past By feith
                    stedfast…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And euer to be Where alle Ioye ysOra pro
                    nobis
